# GKGameCenterControllerDelegate

**Protocol**

The delegate that GameKit calls when the player dismisses the dashboard.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol GKGameCenterControllerDelegate : NSObjectProtocol
```

## Overview

Delegates of [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKGameCenterViewController] objects conform to the `GKGameCenterControllerDelegate` protocol.

## Handling User Actions

- **gameCenterViewControllerDidFinish(_:)**: Handles when the player dismisses the dashboard.

## Setting the view controller delegate

- **gameCenterDelegate**: The view controller’s delegate.

## Inherits From

- NSObjectProtocol

items.description: Handles when the player dismisses the dashboard.
items.name: gameCenterViewControllerDidFinish(_:)
